EmailTemplate.subject: Your feedback is Important: CX is our top priority
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
We at NCR are proud to work by your side, providing high-quality service experiences to help you deliver on your business requirements. Together, we continue to be better. And we remain fully committed to driving improvements to ensure we deliver a differentiated customer experience on your behalf. This year, we continue to enhance the customer experience based on your feedback. Your account manager will be sharing some of those details with you.
Here are some highlights of those improvements:
- Strategic partnerships to help deliver on your digital transformation strategy
- Solution innovation with Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) and edge computing
- Continued enhancements to our strategic portfolio roadmap
- Enabling faster onboarding and service delivery via digital enablement investments
- Achieved solid progress producing higher quality invoicing Beginning Monday, October 11, you’ll start receiving our 2021 relationship survey. It takes only about three minutes to complete and focuses on several ways to strengthen our strategic relationship. The survey is flexible, so you can skip areas that don’t apply. And we love written feedback. This is a big help in understanding the results.
Your voice truly matters and we’re eager to hear from you. Thank you for your feedback and support. It’s a privilege to be your strategic partner.
Sincerely,
Sophia Williams SVP and General Manager NCR Telecom and Technology
